mapper.select: SELECT pj.id , pj.name , pj.client_name , DATE_FORMAT(pj.finish_date, '%Y.%m') AS finish_date , f.id AS file_id , CONCAT(f.path, f.original_name, f.type) AS oriFileName , CONCAT(f.path, f.name, f.type) AS fileName FROM project pj LEFT JOIN file f ON f.id = pj.file_id WHERE pj.organization_code = #{orgCode} AND pj.is_use = 1 AND pj.is_delete = 0
SELECT t.tag_name AS tagName FROM project_tag pt LEFT JOIN tag t ON t.tag_id = pt.tag_id WHERE pt.project_id = #{id}
